ygData.subject: lvl 49 hybrid-only spells.. interesting
ygData.msgSnippet: somebody has been peeking thru the spell data file in the everquest directory.. and they discovered that each of the hybrid classes has a unique spell. the sk
ygData.messageBody:
somebody has been peeking thru the spell data file in the everquest
directory.. and they discovered that each of the hybrid classes has a unique
spell. the sk version is called, "life leech". yes, life leech. and the
listed damage is 280.. but with a 2 minute delay between casts. i'm about to
try to get into that data file myself to see if i can confirm or deny this..
i'll let you folks know.

Beld Demonblade
Fennin Ro
